sentence: Many beaches close by and close to Smiths Luau which is wonderful Formal restaurant prices are on the high side
Walking distance to shopping and dining
We ate at the restaurant and it was good even at this late hour after arriving

There is a game room pool bar restaurant fitness area hammocks Adirondack chairs lounge chairs and beach and walking path The breakfast buffet is fabulous from eggs Benedict pancakes local fruit omelet station etc etc etc
Excellent location in Kapa near great restaurants and sights
Salads excellent service fantastic
The seating near the pool and bar is plentiful and inviting as are the chairs and lounges near the beach on the grass
Nice bar with good food
The bar is open air so you can enjoy the fresh air and natural surroundings
The hotel does not have a lot of dining choices but is very near dozens of wonderful and fun looking cafes and food trucks
There ’s a Longs CVS Pharmacy right next to it as well as a Safeway for groceries snacks
Almost the entire place is under construction no pool makeshift bar little to no warning signs for construction and the place is a maze I had to walk through the kitchen to find an exit
No lobby except a makeshift room same with the restaurant the bar you could shuttle to another hotel to use a pool

Yes its under construction right now but guests can use the pool at the resort next dorwhich is an awesome pool with a bar and beach construction sounds start in the late morning and end in the early afternoon and the resort fee was waived for us because of the lack of pool
Breakfast and parking are not complimentary
The restaurant look less than a Third World country
Outdated no pool no breakfast construction debris everywhere and not one staff seemed to care at all
Also the pool was under construction as well as the bar
The second picture was taken in the middle of the night so it is dark but lots of seating in the bar
The other did nt have a huge selection so we ate off the resort
